Package Controllers

Class FilterController

java.lang.Object
Controllers.FilterController
public class FilterController
extends java.lang.Object

The Class FilterController is the controller class of Filter.fxml. Initialize Filter scene that use to import the data sets.

1.0
Version:
1.0
